name: BankAmericard® Credit Card
short_description: Save on interest to help pay down your balance faster
long_description: Stop paying those high interest rates on other credit cards and save. It's that simple.

details.title: No annual fee
details.description: Enjoy no annual fee with the perfect card if you want to save on interest and pay down balances faster

details.title: Low Introductory APR Offer
details.description: Introductory 0% APR for your first 15 billing cycles for purchases and for any balance transfers made within 60 days of opening your account. After that, a Variable APR that's currently 12.99% to 22.99% will apply.

details.title: Save on interest
details.description: Transfer high rate balances and save on interest with an Introductory $0 balance transfer fee for the first 60 days your account is open. After that, the fee for future balance transfers is 3% (min. $10).

details.title: No penalty APR
details.description: No penalty APR. Paying late won't automatically raise your interest rate (APR). Other account pricing and terms apply.

details.title: FICO® Score
details.description: Now, you can access your FICO® Score updated monthly for free, within your Mobile Banking app or in Online Banking. Opt-in to receive your score, the key factors affecting your score, and other information that can help you keep your credit healthy.

details.title: Learn more about credit
details.description: Access to credit education on topics like using credit cards responsibly, budgeting and more

rates_fees.title: Introductory APR
rates_fees.description: 0% for 15 billing cycles. Applies to purchases and to any balance transfers made within 60 days of opening your account.

rates_fees.title: Balance Transfer Fee
rates_fees.description: $0 Intro Balance Transfer fee. Applies to balance transfers made within 60 days of opening your account. After that, the fee for future balance transfers is 3% (min. $10).
